CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV finishes explaining PCI activities to MOT then leaves
CHI watches MOT at table in corner of the room
MOT picks up book box from table
MOT walks to center of the room
CHI turns and slowly starts to walk toward MOT
MOT drops book box on floor next to her

g.ga: on the floor next to MOT

u.a: MOT extends her hand and pats the floor next to her
CHI stands next to MOT with her back to the camera
MOT points to the floor again
CHI starts to sit down on floor in front of MOT
MOT taps her hand on the area of the floor next to her
MOT looks at the book in the box
MOT's eyes are open wide as she looks at CHI
CHI stares at book in box with her back to the camera
CHI takes book out of box
MOT grabs CHI by the shoulders
MOT turns CHI around to face camera and sets her down on the floor next to her
MOT holds the book out in front of CHI
MOT grabs book out of CHI's hands
MOT holds book out in front of CHI
MOT points to picture on book cover
CHI has stopped crying and begins to stare at book MOT is holding in front of her
<$=3> MOT points to pictures on book cover
MOT holds book out closer to CHI
CHI swings her arm to push book cover closed
CHI wiggles restlessly and flings her arms about hitting the book
MOT holds book up in front of CHI
CHI tries to close book by pushing covers together
<1-5> MOT looks over at boxes on table
MOT turns book more toward CHI
CHI grabs the book with both hands
MOT turns the book toward herself to examine the picture more closely
MOT points to picture and looks at CHI
CHI is looking at book as she sits on the floor clasping her foot in her hands
CHI suddenly grimaces and glances around the room
MOT points to a picture on opposite page
<7> MOT points to the lower corner of the page
CHI is staring at page with her mouth open
<$=2> MOT points to pictures as she speaks
MOT leans over and looks at CHI
CHI looks over both pages of the open book
MOT looks down at the book
MOT slides her finger over the picture of seesaw
CHI looks at the book while scratching her head
MOT slides her index finger over the picture using large strokes
MOT points to picture on page
<$=2> MOT points out pictures to CHI
MOT points out pictures on opposite page
MOT puts book back in box
<bef> CHI turns and watches MOT put the book in the box then looks across the room
CHI starts to get up off the floor
CHI scoots over to her original position on the floor
MOT sits down on floor and lays puppet box next to her
CHI peers into box as MOT starts to opens it
MOT leans forward and looks into CHI's face
CHI takes puppets out of box
MOT grabs Cookie_Monster puppet which CHI has in her right hand and begins to slide her hand into it
CHI pulls Cookie_Monster puppet off of MOT's hand
MOT is kneeling down looking at CHI
CHI slips parrot puppet onto her left hand
MOT leans forward on both arms looking down
CHI has the parrot puppet open and close its mouth
<aft> MOT looks up to spot in corner of the room which is out of camera view
CHI tries to slip her right hand into Cookie_Monster puppet
MOT points to Cookie_Monster puppet now on CHI's right hand
CHI is shaking her hands with the puppets on them
MOT is kneeling next to CHI watching her
CHI lets Cookie_Monster puppet slip off her right hand
CHI starts to hold out Cookie_Monster puppet to MOT then withdraws to hold parrot puppet out to herself
CHI holds parrot puppet out to MOT
MOT slips Cookie_Monster puppet unto her right hand
CHI lifts parrot puppet up to MOT
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet open and close mouth when he speaks
MOT holds out Cookie_Monster puppet in front of CHI's face
CHI leans backward as MOT thrusts forward with puppet on her hand
CHI reaches out for Cookie_Monster puppet on MOT's hand
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet nibble CHI's extended hand
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet nibble CHI's hand
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet bite CHI's pigtail
CHI crouches up and puts her hand to her head
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet bite CHI's other pigtail
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet slowly approach CHI's face
MOT has Cookie_Monster puppet slowly approach CHI's face
CHI pushes Cookie_Monster puppet away from her face with her hand
CHI holds out her arm for MOT
MOT slips Cookie_Monster puppet on CHI's hand
CHI looks at puppet then at MOT
CHI hurls Cookie_Monster puppet off her hand and onto MOT's lap
MOT picks up parrot puppet lying in box on the floor
MOT slips parrot puppet on her hand
MOT holds puppet in front of CHI face
MOT points to parrot puppet's nose
CHI stands up rapidly turning her back on MOT
CHI walks over to boxes on table and reaches for one
CHI grabs a box off of the table
CHI walks back to center of the room and lays crayons and paper box on the floor
MOT walks over to table with puppet box in her hand and then returns to center of room and sits on floor next to CHI
MOT sits on the floor next to CHI while looking down into the box
<bef> CHI holds the box cover up over her head . CHI drops box cover to the floor
CHI takes a sheet of paper out of the box
MOT hands a sheet of paper to CHI
CHI glances at box while holding both sheets of paper
MOT watches CHI then leans back out of camera range
CHI's legs are spread wide as she sits on the floor
CHI lays out two sheets of paper on the floor in front of her between her legs
CHI looks up across the room briefly
CHI grabs a crayon out of the box and starts to draw
MOT is partially out of camera view
CHI leans into box and picks up another crayon
CHI begins to trace her hand on the paper
CHI lifts up her hand and looks at it
CHI puts her foot on the paper in front of her and starts to trace it
CHI finishes tracing and takes her foot off the paper
CHI starts to trace her other foot on the paper
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI drops crayon she has been using into the box and picks up another crayon from the box
<bef> CHI colors . CHI is drawing on paper
CHI looks at crayon and then at MOT
CHI looks closely at crayon in her hand
MOT is out of camera range
<aft> MOT picks up a crayon off the floor and drops it in the box
CHI turns around and puts the crayon in the box
CHI puts papers in the box
CHI takes cover and puts it on the box
MOT now back in camera view
CHI looks at table as she stands up and walks over toward it
CHI lifts house box off the table and brings it to the center of the room where she lays it down
MOT helps guide box to the floor
MOT lifts up flap of box
CHI pulls house out of box
MOT pulls house closer to herself
CHI opens house up to expose interior
MOT leans over and peers into interior of house
CHI crawls over and sits in front of interior of house
CHI leans forward reaching into the house
MOT leans forward peering into the house
CHI tries to open garage door
CHI pulls car out of garage
CHI looks at car in her hand
CHI slides car back into garage
CHI is sliding car in and out of garage
CHI puts a doll in the car
MOT glances up at observation window
MOT moves in response to the tap on the window
MOT repositions herself and house slightly closer to camera
<bef> CHI looks into the house then reaches for a doll
CHI takes another doll and puts it in the car
CHI slides car into the garage
CHI tries to pull down garage door
MOT helps pull down garage door
CHI leans forward looking into the house
MOT leans over and looks into the house
MOT lifts up a table and looks at it
CHI points to room on second floor of house
MOT taps the first floor of the house with her finger several times
CHI moves her head to one side while looking into the house
CHI places her hand in a room on the second floor
MOT looks closer at the interior of the house
MOT points to room on the first floor
MOT puts her hand in first floor room and taps the floor several times
MOT touches two rooms on the second floor in rapid succession
knocking heard on observation room window
CHI is staring into the interior of the house
MOT glances at the camera then back down at the house
CHI points to room on the first floor
MOT seems to think someone behind the observation window is trying to get her attention
CHI points to room on the first floor
CHI slowly starts to close up the house
MOT opens and closes front door of house then rings doorbell
CHI crawls around to rear of house
MOT leans over to look at rear of house
CHI sits behind the house facing the camera . CHI looks at the house
<aft> MOT opens house up to expose interior again
CHI lays down on her stomach to examine rear door more closely
<aft> MOT leans over house to look at rear door
CHI reaches for garage from the rear
CHI stands up and walks about the room briefly . CHI looks around
MOT starts to put beds in the bed+room
<bef> CHI turns and looks in the direction of MOT . CHI walks over to crayons and paper box lying on the floor
CHI picks up crayons and paper box
CHI brings crayons and paper box to place on floor next to MOT and house
MOT is rearranging furniture in the house
CHI starts to open up crayons and paper box
CHI looks over at MOT briefly
MOT takes dolls out of the house and lays them on the floor
MOT opens up garage and takes out the dolls which are in the car
CHI has paper spread out on the floor and begins to draw with crayons
MOT is taking playpieces out of the house and rearranging furniture in the room
MOT holds up dog for CHI to see
CHI starts to put paper back into crayons and paper box
CHI looks up at dog in MOT's hand
CHI puts crayons and paper into box and puts the cover on
CHI stands up while leaning over the box
CHI tries to push cover down on box
CHI turns the cover then tries to place it on top of the box bottom
MOT is out of camera range
CHI turns cover around parallel to box bottom

g.ga: put the cover on the box

u.a: CHI lets go of cover and stands up
CHI walks toward door and stands there looking at the doorknob
MOT closes cover on crayons and paper box
CHI turns around and slowly walks back toward MOT
CHI is fidgeting with her pigtail
MOT reaches out and straightens CHI's jumper
MOT reaches up and touches CHI's cheek and wipes her face
MOT looks up sympathetically at CHI and nods
CHI waves her hand and contorts her body as she screams
CHI stomps her feet and waves her arms in a tantrum
CHI grabs MOT's arm and pulls
CHI reaches up and grabs door handle
CHI contorts her body swinging arms and twisting legs in a tantrum
